pros: Company culture is very positive. Nothing bad to say about working for Capstone.

pros: Great team to work with - management at times would be appreciative of all the work completed to keep students both safe and up keeping the main college dorms and common areas.
cons: Management changed frequently during my time with this company - after a senior staff member resigned her position, there was much drama within the hierarchy of the company's management staff and several directorial changes which caused much anxiety and uncertainty. (a couple of years of mismanagement)

job_title: Community Assistant in College Park, MD
pros: Great work culture. Family like and flexible
Working with grad students and the office coordinators. I enjoy the customer service side of the position.
cons: Chaotic management team in place right now. Need better training process in place and better supervisors to oversee the employees.

job_title: Community Assistant in College Park, MD
pros: If the people are cool it is a fun job.
cons: You have to stay up all night, work weird hours, cannot use the bathroom. Management is not concerned about students well being. Sometimes feels unsafe.

job_title: Office Assistant in College Park, MD
pros: Good position for a student; homework during downtime; works with your schedule
cons: EVERYONE complains about management; managers are impersonal and lack communication skills

review_title: Okay place to work if you don't take things personal.

pros: Family orientated business.. Respects people of authority.
